name: Spark
description: The Spark is a tiny elemental creature with a chaotic nature, characterized by its impressive agility and lightning-infused abilities.
memorable: Its unique ability to inhabit humanoids makes it a dangerous foe in battle as it can turn allies against each other.
goals: To create chaos and potentially use inhabited hosts to attack other creatures.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other elementals or in areas charged with elemental energy.
environment: Typically found in areas suffused with elemental energies, often associated with storms or lightning.
strengths: Immunity to lightning damage and resistance to most physical nonmagical damage, making it especially tough against melee attackers.
weaknesses: Notably low strength limits its physical attacks.
attacks: Can unleash three Electric Touch attacks in one turn, dealing significant lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Inhabit allows the Spark to take control of a humanoid's body, incapacitating its host while it uses their form to attack others.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dark conditions.
skills: Proficient in Dexterity saving throws, making it adept at avoiding various threats.
additional_information: Elemental nature means it does not require food, air, or sleep.
Possesses multiple immunities to conditions, remaining effective in battle.
High Dexterity of 20 increases its evasiveness.
Electric Touch can be very effective against vulnerable enemies.
Chaotic Neutral alignment makes its actions unpredictable.

nimble creature that can control others
spark elemental found in stormy areas
monster that can inhabit humanoid hosts
